item.title: Hello R Markdown
item.description: R Markdown Few tips to start being more “artsy” 1. Work on the quality of your code. Picture every line you write being played at a cinema near you. 2. Invest time in learning how a language actually works and start contributing to the community. This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see http://rmarkdown.
